description: The IDF says the strike hit a “terrorist squad”, but witnesses tell the BBC the group posed no threat.
maintext: "They are acting just as they used to," she said. "The only thing that changed is that, before, the army would shoot a guy in his leg. But now it's bigger - now they are bombing with rockets and killing as many people as they can."
title: West Bank strike: Israel accused of targeting civilians in deadly attack
